info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 1:19AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to occasionally heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile, with snowfall rates of a half inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 117 AM EST, a band of moderate to heavy snow was along a line extending from near Center Brunswick to near Hunter and moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Rensselaer, Hunter, Ravena, Castleton-On-Hudson, West Sand Lake, and Wyantskill around 120 AM EST. Grafton and Averill Park around 125 AM EST. New Baltimore around 130 AM EST. North-South Lake Campground around 135 AM EST. Nassau, Coxsackie, and Berlin around 140 AM EST. Valatie and Kinderhook around 145 AM EST. Athens around 150 AM EST. Catskill and Lorenz Park around 155 AM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 24. Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 7. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
